content:
Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 18, "index": 15}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 26}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 41, "index": 39}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft stripped_crimson_hyphae. Stripped_crimson_hyphae requires placing 4 stripped_crimson_stem in the crafting grid in the shape of a square, therefore I will first need to move the stripped_crimson_stem from slot 26 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 18, "index": 15}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 41, "index": 39}]

thought: Now I have one stripped_crimson_stem in the crafting grid, I need to place another one in the crafting grid to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the stripped_crimson_stem to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 18, "index": 15}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 41, "index": 39}]

thought: Now I have two stripped_crimson_stems in the crafting grid, I need to place another one below the first. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the stripped_crimson_stem to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 18, "index": 15}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 26}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 41, "index": 39}]

thought: Now I have three stripped_crimson_stems in the crafting grid, I need to place another one to the right of the second. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 2, and therefore I will move the stripped_crimson_stem to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 26 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_crimson_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "purpur_pillar", "quantity": 18, "index": 15}, {"type": "bee_spawn_egg", "quantity": 2, "index": 16}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral_block", "quantity": 62, "index": 19}, {"type": "fletching_table", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 32, "index": 30}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 37}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 41, "index": 39}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_crimson_hyphae by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
